sentences.sentence: Briefly, amazingly, the new-fangled money worked.
sentences.translation: 迅速地，惊人地，这种新奇的钱真的能用了。

sentences.sentence: Over the past couple years, they have been pouring billions into new-fangled companies.
sentences.translation: 在过去数年中，这些人已经将数十亿美元资金注入到新奇的公司。

sentences.sentence: So, why would you not want to use this new fangled paradigm in rich Internet applications?
sentences.translation: 那么，为什么您不希望在您的富internet应用程序中使用这一新颖的范例呢？
